meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by granulocytes.
meanings.sent1: The granulocytic cells help fight infections in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the granulocytic properties of white blood cells.
meanings.sent3: The granulocytic warriors battled the invading germs with valor.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as granulocytic as the body's immune response.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the intricate world of granulocytic structures.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or being a granulocyte.
meanings.sent1: The granulocytic characteristics of the cell were evident under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The patient's condition improved after receiving granulocytic treatment.
meanings.sent3: The granulocytic superhero saved the day by fighting off the bacteria.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was as granulocytic as the white blood cells.
meanings.sent5: The granulocytic nature of the immune system was crucial for fighting infections.
